name: Davidoff - Mille - Series 3000
additionalNotes: Signature Series Cigars represent traditional favorites under a new umbrella: the Mille 1000, 2000 and 6000 as well as the Classic Ambassadrice and No.2.Â This smallest cigar in the "Mille" series is one of the first Davidoff cigar formats to be made in the Dominican Republic. The Davidoff 1000 is characterised by a finely-balanced, medium-bodied aroma. The "1000" is the perfect cigar for more brief, yet aroma-rich interludes of smoking pleasure.
